forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a morning shower. A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a morning shower. A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low around 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 57F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 6C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning becoming a steady rain in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
